languages.text: На звездном челне прибыли на Фолстоун несчетны тьмы страждущих, и страхом были объяты души их. Великое хуление веры сталося в доме их и обратило их в бесприютных скитальцев, алкающих помощи и убежища.
Countless tortured souls, steeped in fear, arrived on Foulstone in a star-barque. A great apostasy had befallen their home and turned them into abject wanderers seeking help and refuge.
languages.original_text: На звездном челне прибыли на Фолстоун несчетны тьмы страждущих, и страхом были объяты души их. Великое хуление веры сталося в доме их и обратило их в бесприютных скитальцев, алкающих помощи и убежища.

traits.locale_text: Countless tortured souls, steeped in fear, arrived at Foulstone in a starboat. A great apostasy had befallen their home and turned them into abject wanderers seeking help and refuge.

languages.text: Un sinfín de almas torturadas, sumidas en el terror, llegaron a Rocainmunda en una barca estelar. Una gran apostasía había asolado su hogar, convirtiéndolos en vagabundos abyectos en busca de ayuda y cobijo.
languages.original_text: Countless tortured souls, steeped in fear, arrived on Foulstone in a star-barque. A great apostasy had befallen their home and turned them into abject wanderers seeking help and refuge.

traits.locale_text: Un sinfín de almas torturadas, sumidas en el terror, llegaron a Rocainmunda en una barca estelar. Una gran apostasía había asolado su hogar, convirtiéndolos en vagabundos abyectos en busca de ayuda y cobijo.

languages.text: 无数饱受恐惧折磨的人们乘坐星舰，来到荒寂岩地。他们的故乡遭遇了可怕的叛乱，他们沦为一群艰难困苦的流浪者，四处寻找帮助与庇护。
languages.original_text: Countless tortured souls, steeped in fear, arrived on Foulstone in a star-barque. A great apostasy had befallen their home and turned them into abject wanderers seeking help and refuge.

traits.locale_text: 无数饱受恐惧折磨的人们乘坐星舰，来到荒寂岩地。他们的故乡遭遇了可怕的叛乱，他们沦为一群艰难困苦的流浪者，四处寻找帮助与庇护。

languages.text: 強い苦しみを抱いた無数の魂達が、恐怖に包まれながら、星間帆船に乗ってファウルストーンに到着する。故郷が強大な背教徒に襲われたことで、彼らは救済と避難先を求める哀れな放浪者となってしまったのだ。
languages.original_text: Countless tortured souls, steeped in fear, arrived on Foulstone in a star-barque. A great apostasy had befallen their home and turned them into abject wanderers seeking help and refuge.

traits.locale_text: 強い苦しみを抱いた無数の魂達が、恐怖に包まれながら、星間帆船に乗ってファウルストーンに到着する。故郷が強大な背教徒に襲われたことで、彼らは救済と避難先を求める哀れな放浪者となってしまったのだ。

languages.text: Unzählige gepeinigte Seelen trafen angsterfüllt in einer Sternbarke auf Foulstone ein. Eine große Apostasie in ihrer Heimat hatte sie zu entmutigten Wanderern gemacht, die Hilfe und Zuflucht suchten.
languages.original_text: Countless tortured souls, steeped in fear, arrived on Foulstone in a star-barque. A great apostasy had befallen their home and turned them into abject wanderers seeking help and refuge.

traits.locale_text: Unzählige gepeinigte Seelen trafen angsterfüllt in einer Sternbarke auf Foulstone ein. Eine große Apostasie in ihrer Heimat hatte sie zu entmutigten Wanderern gemacht, die Hilfe und Zuflucht suchten.

languages.text: Un flot quasi ininterrompu d'âmes torturées en proie à la terreur arrive à Rochepeste à bord d'une barge stellaire. Une grande apostasie avait assombri leur foyer et réduit ces malheureuses à l'état d'abjects vagabonds en quête de secours et de protection.
languages.original_text: Countless tortured souls, steeped in fear, arrived on Foulstone in a star-barque. A great apostasy had befallen their home and turned them into abject wanderers seeking help and refuge.

traits.locale_text: Un flot quasi ininterrompu d'âmes torturées en proie à la terreur arrive à Rochepeste à bord d'une barge stellaire. Une grande apostasie avait assombri leur foyer et réduit ces malheureuses à l'état d'abjects vagabonds en quête de secours et de protection.

languages.text: Korkuya teslim olmuş, keder içindeki sayısız ruh; bir yıldız barkasıyla Menfurtaş'a geldi. Yurtlarının üzerine büyük bir kâfirlik çökmüş; onları yardım ve barınak arayan, sefil durumdaki yolculara dönüştürmüş.
languages.original_text: Countless tortured souls, steeped in fear, arrived on Foulstone in a star-barque. A great apostasy had befallen their home and turned them into abject wanderers seeking help and refuge.

traits.locale_text: Korkuya teslim olmuş, keder içindeki sayısız ruh; bir yıldız barkasıyla Menfurtaş'a geldi. Yurtlarının üzerine büyük bir kâfirlik çökmüş; onları yardım ve barınak arayan, sefil durumdaki yolculara dönüştürmüş.
